attributes.background: Our Local LABOUR Mp Cat Smith has took upon herself to say that the people of FLEETWOOD would welcome the Refugees we have not been consulted to any of This so we would like to set up this Petition for the People of FLEETWOOD to say NO TO REFUGEES!

rejection.details:
These decisions are for local councils to make. You could raise this issue with your local councillors. You can find out who they are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
